trans-unit.source: Defines a class for SQL execution exceptions in the <see cref="N:System.Web.Management" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="N:System.Web.Management" /> 命名空间中为 SQL 执行异常定义一个类。

trans-unit.source: This class is provided as a means to differentiate SQL execution exceptions from other application exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作一种方式来区分 SQL 执行从其他应用程序异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException> exception type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException>异常类型。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException" /> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException" /> class using the passed message.
trans-unit.target: 使用传递的消息对 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException" /> 类的新实例进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> encountered.
trans-unit.target: 遇到的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException" /> class using the passed message and exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用传递的消息和异常初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The SQL Server instance against which the SQL commands are run.
trans-unit.target: 运行 SQL 命令时依据的 SQL Server 实例。

trans-unit.source: The database against which the SQL commands are run.
trans-unit.target: 运行 SQL 命令时依据的数据库。

trans-unit.source: The name of the installation file containing the SQL commands being run.
trans-unit.target: 包含正在运行的 SQL 命令的安装文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The SQL commands being run when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 异常发生时正在运行的 SQL 命令。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException" /> encountered when processing the SQL commands.
trans-unit.target: 处理 SQL 命令时遇到的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the SQL commands being run when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 获取异常发生时正在运行的 SQL 命令。

trans-unit.source: The SQL commands being run when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 异常发生时正在运行的 SQL 命令。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException.Commands%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException> exception type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException.Commands%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException>异常类型。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the database being accessed when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 获取异常发生时正在访问的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the database being accessed when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 异常发生时正在访问的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException.Database%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException> exception type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException.Database%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException>异常类型。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception encountered when processing the SQL commands.
trans-unit.target: 获取处理 SQL 命令时遇到的异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException" /> encountered when processing the SQL commands.
trans-unit.target: 处理 SQL 命令时遇到的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException> exception type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException.Exception%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException>异常类型。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Allows the exception to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 允许将异常序列化。

trans-unit.source: Gets the SQL Server instance being accessed when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 获取异常发生时正在访问的 SQL Server 实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the SQL Server instance being accessed when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 异常发生时正在访问的 SQL Server 实例的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException.Server%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException> exception type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException.Server%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException>异常类型。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices>类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path and name of the file containing the SQL commands being run when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 获取异常发生时包含正在运行的 SQL 命令的文件的路径和名称。

trans-unit.source: The path and name of the file that contains the SQL commands being run when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 异常发生时包含正在运行的 SQL 命令的文件的路径和名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException.SqlFile%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException> exception type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException.SqlFile%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException>异常类型。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices>类。
